actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to continue until the close of June 30, 1989, the existing suspension of duties on certain forms of zinc.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to continue the suspension of duty on certain forms of zinc through June 30, 1989. Makes the suspension of duty retroactive to June 30, 1984, if a request for such treatment is filed within a specified time.

titles.title: A bill to continue until the close of June 30, 1989, the existing suspension of duties on certain forms of zinc.
